body:
[nitpick] Consider expanding the time threshold used to validate the backup's creation time, as the current 1-second tolerance may lead to flaky tests on slower systems.
```suggestion
        if time.Since(b.CreatedAt) > time.Second*3 {
```

_Originally posted by @Copilot in https://github.com/jdfalk/subtitle-manager/pull/916#discussion_r2157570601_

---
**Codex update**: Increased allowed backup creation time to 3 seconds in tests. This gives slower systems enough time and prevents flakiness.
Applying fix to backup creation tests by allowing a 3-second threshold. This reduces flakiness on slower machines.
